meanings.definition: To remove a veil or covering from
meanings.sent1: She unveils the beautiful painting for everyone to see.
meanings.sent2: The magician unveils the trick behind the illusion.
meanings.sent3: At the party, she unveils her surprise gift with a big smile.
meanings.sent4: As the fog lifts, nature unveils its breathtaking beauty.
meanings.sent5: The sun slowly unveils the colors of the morning sky.

meanings.definition: To reveal or disclose something previously hidden or secret
meanings.sent1: The detective unveils the true identity of the culprit.
meanings.sent2: The company unveils its new product line at the conference.
meanings.sent3: The cat playfully unveils its hiding spot behind the curtains.
meanings.sent4: The author unveils a shocking plot twist in the final chapter.
meanings.sent5: The archaeologist unveils ancient artifacts buried for centuries.
